sen.e: Her graveyard is in Yanaka Cemetery, however, her grave is also found in Kozukapparaekoin Temple and the gravestone is located next to the six outstanding figures collectively called 'Tenpo Rokkasen' (outstanding persons in the Tenpo era), Nezumi Kozo (a famous thief who lived during the Edo period), and Ude no Kisaburo (a chivalrous person who lived in the Edo period).
